page.title: 01General survey of area.
page.content: This area includes several distinct communities such as New Invention, Short Heath,Bloxwich and Leamore.It is highly residential bordering upon the town of Willenhall in the south and the agricultural area of Essington in the north.It is an area of declining industry;many factories are being demolished and there is an unemployment rate of 20%.The population is multicultural with communities of Asian and West Indian origin.The area is cut in two by the M6 Motorway and also includes the Wyrley and Essington Canal.Many of the schools in the area are suffering from declining rolls,some facing closure. The area includes the boundary between Wolverhampton and Walsall.
